title: Kimi Sae Ireba...
sinopse:
1-3) Nothing Without You
The continuation of the love story between the son-in-law and his deceased wife's father. Sequel to Kimi Sae Oreba... (chapter 3 of Zange).

4. Right Hand Man
   A boy is troubled over the fact that he has no interest in the opposite sex.

5. Bringing Up Puppy in Machida's
   Short extra of Nothing Without You.

(Source: Baka Updates)
